item.title: Book Review: Fraud: Cybercrime Story
item.description: https://www.amazon.in/dp/B073ZFT1VR/ref=rdr_kindle_ext_tmb The book is a quick read at just over 81 pages. It’s a book that you would like to “Read In One Sitting”. The book has a story about Cybercrime, How fraud happens? What is real life, a serious effect of Cybercrime in our life? I like the writing style. the characterization is excellent. Especially the hero of the story Samyak. The book also has a social message. The Book is not only for the technical reader but also non-technical readers.
